text: Johnny Lockett was a British professional Grand Prix motorcycle road racer who competed in the 1940s and 1950s. He competed in the 1949 Grand Prix motorcycle racing season riding on a 500cc Norton bike and finished seventh overall with 13 points, 17 points behind fellow British rider and teammate Harold Daniell.1949 Moto GP results == World Championship results == (key) (Races in bold indicate pole position; races in italics indicate fastest lap.) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" !
